Name: Deck of Cards
Description: The cards in this deck are razor sharp and fly with precision.  An worthy weapon for any adventurer.

Defend.Name: Shuffle
Defend.Action_String: <User> shuffles their deck, preparing to block for 4 damage.

Attack.Name: Rank
Attack.Action_String: <User> pulls a card and throws it at <Target>, dealing <Damage> damage.

Attack Crit.Name: Joker
Attack Crit.Action_String: <User> pulls a joker and throws it at <Target>, debuffing <Target>'s attack by 6 for 2 rounds.

Special.Name: Suit
Special.Action_String: <User> pulls an ace and throws it at <Target>, dealing <Damage> damage.
